title: A Dog's Tale
subtle: Pourquoi Tale (fiction), 687 words, Level O (Grade 2), Lexile 780L
description: A Dog's Tale is a retelling of a folktale from Argentina and Paraguay. In this pourquoi tale, readers learn that a joke played on dogs by cats long ago is the reason why dogs chase cats today. Illustrations support the story.
meta: bared, communities, consequences, managed, mischievous, responded, revenge, tension, vain
